data.Question: Do you have a committee dedicated to information security involving your company's management (e.g., COSTRAT, CODIR, COPIL dedicated to these subjects with presence of one or more members of your executive committee)?
Do you have a governance body responsible for personal data protection within your company (e.g., DPO)?

Do you have a committee dedicated to personal data protection involving your company's management (e.g., COSTRAT, CODIR, COPIL dedicated to these subjects with presence of one or more members of your executive committee)?
data.Commentaire: The personal data processed is mainly that of our employees. The necessary processing registers are available and regularly updated.

data.Question: Do you have an Information Systems Security Policy approved by your management, revised in the last 12 months, communicated to appropriate personnel and based on recognized standards/frameworks (e.g., ISO 27001, ISO 27002, NIST CSF, CIS Controls)?
data.Commentaire: This document is classified as restricted.

data.Question: Do you have a Personal Data Protection Policy approved by your management, revised in the last 12 months and communicated to appropriate personnel?
data.Commentaire: The personal data processed is mainly that of our employees. The necessary processing registers are available and regularly updated.

data.Question: Do you train all your employees in information security and personal data protection (e.g., mandatory training course for new entrants, specific training course for administrators and developers, etc.)?
data.Commentaire: All employees must follow the security training course at least every 2 years. 3 hours of awareness + knowledge verification

data.Question: Do you have one or more of the following certifications: ISO 27001, SOC 1 Type II Report, ISAE 3402 Type II Report, SOC 2 Type II Report covering the scope of services offered?
data.Commentaire: ISO27001:2022 "Design, development and operational maintenance activities of the platform in SaaS mode"

data.Question: If the scope of services offered is likely to process health data or bank card data, are you respectively HDS and PCI-DSS compliant?
Will you host/process the entrusted data only within the European Union?
Do you have one or more of the following attestations: penetration tests (in the last 12 months), configuration audits, vulnerability scans, current cybersecurity insurance?

Do you have a SOC* (internal or outsourced)? How often do you audit this SOC and by what means?

Do you have an up-to-date Business Continuity Plan tested in the last 12 months? Can you describe the data backup systems in place (e.g., 3-2-1)?
data.Commentaire: A restoration test is performed quarterly

data.Question: Do you have a crisis management system? Does this system allow responding to a cyber crisis (e.g., critical ransomware incident)? Do you regularly test this system and if so at what frequency?
data.Commentaire: Our incident management policy does not include tests.
